text: Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim, arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofan kam bagh, uan dafarir puzir tam isɨ memen ghuzim darugh, egh ghuzir muziaritam isɨ asɨziba da bar isia mɨghɨrir ofa gamir dakozimɨn, ofa gamir dakozimɨn mɨkebabar itir bulmakaun kombar mɨn garir biziba bar dar aghuigh. Egh ghuzir naba isɨ asɨziba bar isia mɨghɨrir ofa gamir dakozimɨn mɨngarim gingegh.
